title: jwt based user authentication
description: Test the user authentication system using JWT tokens including login, registration, and password reset endpoints to ensure secure access for buyer, seller, and admin roles.

title: product crud operations with media and location filtering
description: Verify the create, read, update, and delete operations for products including support for multiple images and videos, and filtering products by location.

title: favorites system add remove and list
description: Test the functionality for users to add products to favorites, remove them, and retrieve the list of favorite products accurately.

title: search and filter products by criteria
description: Validate the product search and filtering API to ensure it returns correct results based on name, category, location, and price range.

title: market reports publishing and access
description: Test the admin's ability to create, publish, and share market price reports with images and verify that users can access these reports.

title: real time notifications delivery
description: Verify that real-time notifications for product requests, orders, and system updates are delivered promptly and correctly to users.

title: order management status tracking
description: Test the order creation, status updates, and delivery information tracking to ensure orders are managed correctly throughout their lifecycle.

title: product request creation and notification
description: Validate the product request feature where buyers can request specific products and sellers receive notifications about these requests.

title: user profile view and edit
description: Test the user profile management endpoints to view and update personal information including name, phone, email, and profile image.

title: admin dashboard user and product management
description: Verify the admin dashboard APIs for managing users, approving products, and monitoring system statistics.
